Package lv.team3.botcovidlab.adapter.facebook.handlers

Class PatientApplicationUtil

java.lang.Object
lv.team3.botcovidlab.adapter.facebook.handlers.PatientApplicationUtil
@Service
public class PatientApplicationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Class that manages all the actions when user select the Apply for a test button
Author:
Vladislavs Visnevskis
